item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1448604362911{margin-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1449140720718{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner offset="vc_hidden-xs" css=".vc_custom_1449140656921{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][rev_slider_vc alias="about_us_slider"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1449140651655{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]

We are TransCargo!

Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather. Integrated Road networks, covering the world. Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route. Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity.  

Our Mission

[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1448605934156{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1449140861901{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]

item.title: BestLogistics sponsors Aprilia Racing team
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" use_theme_fonts="yes"][stm_post_details][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447245853444{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]How to move a machine that is 33m long, 15m wide and 18m high? BestLogistics’ Project Logistics team knows the drill. The team coordinated the transport of a terminal built by Van Aalst Bulk Handling — cranes to discharge cement, a ship loader and two conveyor systems — together about 17 000 tons via the port of Rotterdam, the Netherlands to its final destination in two new cement-import terminals in New Zealand.[/vc_column_text][stm_image_gallery images="258,258,258,258"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447245830869{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]As a sponsor of the Aprilia Racing team competing in the World Superbike Championship, one of the top three global motorsport series alongside Formula 1 and MotoGP we have got the pleasure of offering our customers a unique paddock grandstands and Aprilia box experience during several rounds.
I’ve been happy with the services provided by BestLogistic LLC. Samantha Culligan has been wonderful! She has returned my calls quickly, and she answered all my questions!
In latest round, the Pirelli Spanish Round on 19 and 20 September, the Apria team booked great results with two riders on the podium. Congratulations! Aprilia Racing is part of Piaggio Group, a global motorcycle producer and BestLogistics’ customer. The team is one of the most successful in the world with 54 titles and it is currently the world champion.[/vc_column_text][stm_post_bottom][stm_post_about_author][stm_post_comments][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][stm_sidebar sidebar="272"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Incoterms
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][stm_sidebar sidebar="272"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447743973079{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]

What are Incoterms?

INCOTERMS are a set of three-letter standard trade terms most commonly used in international contracts for the sale of goods. It is essential that you are aware of your terms of trade prior to shipment.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1449205358710{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205271760{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447743804044{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
EXW (EX Works)
EX Works EXW named place Incoterms® 2010 — This term may be used for either domestic or international trade.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205275416{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447743844082{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
FCA (Free Carrier)
Free Carrier FCA named place Incoterms® 2010 — This term may be used whatever mode or modes of transport will be used.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1449205362814{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205285360{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447744035904{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
CPT (Carriage Paid To)
Carriage Paid To CPT named place Incoterms® 2010 — This term may be used whatever mode or modes of transport will be used.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205289319{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447744056383{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
CIP (Carriage & Insurance Paid)
Carriage and Insurance Paid CIP to named place Incoterms® 2010 — This term may be used whatever mode or modes of transport will be used.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1449205366726{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205299487{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447744091267{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
DAT (Delivered at Terminal)
Delivered at Terminal DAT named place Incoterms® 2010 — This term may be used regardless of the mode or modes of carriage to be used. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205304478{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447744107979{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
DAP (Delivered at Place)
Delivered at Place DAP named place Incoterms® 2010 — This term may be used whatever mode or modes of transport will be used.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1449205370636{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205314631{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447744151114{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
DDP (Delivered Duty Paid)
Delivered Duty Paid DDP named place of destination Incoterms® 2010 — This term may be used whatever mode or modes of transport may be used.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205320310{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447744180049{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
FAS (Free Alongside Ship)
Free Alongside Ship FAS named port of shipment Incoterms® 2010 — The seller delivers the goods when they are placed alongside the vessel nominated[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1449205379621{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205334719{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447744222714{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
FOB (Free on Board)
Free On Board FOB named port of shipment Incoterms® 2010 — There is a significant change from the meaning of this term in former revisions of[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449205338110{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447744238353{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
CFR (Cost & Freight)
Cost and Freight CFR named port of destination Incoterms® 2010 — This rule is intended for use only when carriage is by sea or inland waterway.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1447744004634{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447744263927{border-top-width: 1px !important;border-right-width: 1px !important;border-bottom-width: 1px !important;border-left-width: 1px !important;padding-top: 40px !important;padding-right: 30px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;padding-left: 30px !important;border-left-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-left-style: solid !important;border-right-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-right-style: solid !important;border-top-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-top-style: solid !important;border-bottom-color: #e6e6e6 !important;border-bottom-style: solid !important;}"]
CIF (Cost Insurance & Freight)
Cost Insurance and Freight CIF named port of destination Incoterms® 2010 — This term is to be used only when carriage is by sea or inland waterway.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1449829383513{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_column_text]

Track any Freight Management shipment

Track any BestLogistics Freight Management shipment. If you require maximum visibility to your customer Freight Management transactions, contact your BestLogistics Representative, or local BestLogistics Service Center.[/vc_column_text][contact-form-7 id="490"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][vc_btn title="Download Brochure" style="outline" shape="round" color="theme_style_1" align="left" i_icon_fontawesome="stm-download" add_icon="true" button_block="true"][vc_btn title="Ask Our Experts" style="outline" shape="round" color="theme_style_1" align="left" i_icon_fontawesome="stm-skype" add_icon="true" button_block="true" css=".vc_custom_1447746632849{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}"][stm_recent_posts_widget number="3" show_date="1"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" el_class="secondary_bg_color" css=".vc_custom_1447746818281{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_cta h2="Not sure which solution fits your business needs?" shape="square" add_button="right" btn_title="Contact Now" btn_style="outline" btn_shape="round" btn_color="white" btn_i_align="right" btn_i_icon_fontawesome="stm-arrow-next" btn_add_icon="true" el_class="secondary_bg_color"][/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Vacancies
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1449144040608{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][stm_sidebar sidebar="784"][/vc_column][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447911912137{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]

Helping you reach your fullest potential

Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather. Integrated Road networks, covering the world. Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route. Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity.[/vc_column_text][vc_custom_heading text="Open Positions" use_theme_fonts="yes"][stm_vacancies][vc_custom_heading text="Frequently Asked Questions" use_theme_fonts="yes"][vc_tta_accordion style="outline" shape="square" color="theme_style" c_icon="chevron" c_position="right" active_section="1"][vc_tta_section title="HOW MANY TIMES DO I HAVE TO TELL YOU A FEW DIFFERENT WAYS?" tab_id="1447734797771-9e120a4a-d349"][vc_column_text]Progressively generate synergistic total linkage through cross-media intellectual capital. item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1447935204191{margin-bottom: 100px !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_column_text]

Meet Our Brilliant Minds

Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather. Integrated Road networks, covering the world. Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route. Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity.[/vc_column_text][stm_staff_list count="6"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][stm_sidebar sidebar="272"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1450672229543{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 78px !important;padding-bottom: 48px !important;}" el_class="secondary_bg_color"][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3" css=".vc_custom_1449142338264{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][stm_counter counter_value="320" drawing="yes" icon_width_svg="65" icon_size="64" title="Projects Done" drawing_icon="stm-projects-done" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3" css=".vc_custom_1449142329000{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][stm_counter counter_value="72" drawing="yes" icon_width_svg="64" icon_size="68" title="Clients Worldwide" drawing_icon="stm-clients-worldwide" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3" css=".vc_custom_1449142343672{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][stm_counter counter_value="153" drawing="yes" icon_width="80" icon_width_svg="52" icon_size="67" title="Owned Vehicles" drawing_icon="stm-owned-vehicles" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-3 vc_col-md-3" css=".vc_custom_1449142350247{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"][stm_counter counter_value="114" drawing="yes" icon_width="100" icon_width_svg="68" icon_size="67" title="People in Team" drawing_icon="stm-people-in-team" icon_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1448347192284{margin-bottom: 70px !important;}"][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1449136877107{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"]

Quality and Performance at the right price

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4"][vc_column_text]Transcargo Ltd. is one of the world's leading providers of end-to-end supply chain solutions. We combine intercontinental Air and Ocean Freight with comprehensive Value-Added Logistics Services and Supply Chain Services. The range of Supply Chain Solutions can vary from simple transport or storage up to complex operations.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4"][vc_column_text]We optimize all activities around information, material and financial flow. We provide globally integrated end-to-end solutions tailored to our customers' supply chain management needs with a special commitment to industry specific requirements.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1448346440762{margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-color: #1b4562 !important;}"][vc_column][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1449136946410{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449136957585{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][stm_icon icon_size="73" icon_height="100" title_font_size="24" title_font_weight="700" icon="stm-transport839" title="Air Freight" text="Setting the standard in air freight. Our global network has the power to help businesses grow — based on years of experience and influenced by the changing needs of our customers. Our Road specialists will ensure operational excellence as well as cost-effective solutions." link="url:%2Fservices%2Fsea-freight%2F||" title_color="#ffffff" text_color="#ffffff"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449136961602{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][stm_icon icon_size="89" icon_height="100" title_font_size="24" title_font_weight="700" icon="stm-ship" title="Sea Freight" text="TransCargo is the world’s fourth largest provider of ocean freight services. In 2013, TransCargo expedited nearly 1.5 million TEUs via ocean freight. The company’s relationship with customers is moving away from purely transactional business to value-added propositions." title_color="#ffffff" text_color="#ffffff" link="url:%2Fservices%2Fsea-freight%2F||"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner css=".vc_custom_1449136951770{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449136966415{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][stm_icon icon_size="89" icon_height="100" title_font_size="24" title_font_weight="700" icon="stm-transport842" title="Road Freight" text="TransCargo's worldwide network is well positioned and qualified to help your company develop efficient and tailor-made domestic and trans-border programs for distributing your goods. Our Road specialists will ensure operational excellence as well as cost-effective solutions that meet your needs in terms of transit time." title_color="#ffffff" text_color="#ffffff" link="url:%2Fservices%2Fsea-freight%2F||"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449136971250{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"][stm_icon icon_size="89" icon_height="100" title_font_size="24" title_font_weight="700" icon="stm-warehouse" title="Warehousing" text="Our asset-light operating model allows us the ability to choose the correct qualified subcontractors based on diverse customer requirements with an emphasis on compliance, safety, security, professionalism and environmental leadership." title_color="#ffffff" text_color="#ffffff" link="url:%2Fservices%2Fsea-freight%2F||"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" el_class="secondary_bg_color" css=".vc_custom_1448346766847{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_cta h2="Not sure which solution fits your business needs?" shape="square" add_button="right" btn_title="Contact Now" btn_style="outline" btn_shape="round" btn_color="white" btn_i_align="right" btn_i_icon_fontawesome="stm-arrow-next" btn_add_icon="true" el_class="secondary_bg_color" btn_link="url:%2Fcontacts%2F||"][/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1449137019491{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1449137011806{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]

Effective solutions

You benefit from our experience in delivering effective solutions to the complex global supply chains of some of the world’s biggest corporations. You benefit from every innovation, whether it involves a simple extension to our Air and Ocean Freight products, whether it means a development in warehousing, or whether it requires a completely new item.title: Customers rely on us to help them
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" use_theme_fonts="yes"][stm_post_details][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447245853444{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]How to move a machine that is 33m long, 15m wide and 18m high? BestLogistics’ Project Logistics team knows the drill. The team coordinated the transport of a terminal built by Van Aalst Bulk Handling — cranes to discharge cement, a ship loader and two conveyor systems — together about 17 000 tons via the port of Rotterdam, the Netherlands to its final destination in two new cement-import terminals in New Zealand.[/vc_column_text][stm_image_gallery images="258,258,258,258"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447245830869{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]As a sponsor of the Aprilia Racing team competing in the World Superbike Championship, one of the top three global motorsport series alongside Formula 1 and MotoGP we have got the pleasure of offering our customers a unique paddock grandstands and Aprilia box experience during several rounds.
I’ve been happy with the services provided by BestLogistic LLC. Samantha Culligan has been wonderful! She has returned my calls quickly, and she answered all my questions!
In latest round, the Pirelli Spanish Round on 19 and 20 September, the Apria team booked great results with two riders on the podium. Congratulations! Aprilia Racing is part of Piaggio Group, a global motorcycle producer and BestLogistics’ customer. The team is one of the most successful in the world with 54 titles and it is currently the world champion.[/vc_column_text][stm_post_bottom][stm_post_about_author][stm_post_comments][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][stm_sidebar sidebar="272"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: The team coordinated the transport of a terminal built by Van Aalst Bulk Handling and team knows the drill.

The team coordinated the transport of a terminal built by Van Aalst Bulk Handling — cranes to discharge cement, a ship loader and two conveyor systems — together about 17 000 tons via the port of Rotterdam, the Netherlands to its final destination in two new cement-import terminals in New Zealand.[/vc_column_text][stm_image_gallery images="258,258,258,258"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447245830869{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]As a sponsor of the Aprilia Racing team competing in the World Superbike Championship, one of the top three global motorsport series alongside Formula 1 and MotoGP we have got the pleasure of offering our customers a unique paddock grandstands and Aprilia box experience during several rounds.

In latest round, the Pirelli Spanish Round on 19 and 20 September, the Apria team booked great results with two riders on the podium. Congratulations! Aprilia Racing is part of Piaggio Group, a global motorcycle producer and BestLogistics’ customer. The team is one of the most successful in the world with 54 titles and it is currently the world champion.[/vc_column_text][stm_post_bottom][stm_post_about_author][stm_post_comments][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][stm_sidebar sidebar="272"][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Air Export Document Processing Agent
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_column_text]

Air Export Document Processing Agent

Position Description: Manage, evaluate and assess information necessary to construct the project on time, within budget and to the quality specified by the contract documents for the assigned areas.[/vc_column_text][stm_about_vacancy][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447849513387{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]

Essential Duties and Responsibilities

  • Site investigations;
  • Quantity/Material takeoff;
  • Checking estimates for extensions, accuracy, and errors;
  • Preparation of estimate schedules for tendering reviews;
  • Budgeting/Costing;
  • Contacting sub-trades and suppliers for quotations;
  • Evaluating sub-trades quotations;
  • Recommending sub-trades;
  • Participate in tender closings;
  • Compiling and condensing successful and unsuccessful tenders;
  • Follow up with invited Sub-Contractors/Suppliers to confirm their intentions to quote;
  • Maintain Sub-Contractor/Supplier relations;
  • Maintain unit price and productivity knowledge and database;
  • Maintain Career Progression plan;
  • Other Duties and responsibilities as required.
[/vc_column_text][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447849589473{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]

Qualifications

  • A Post Secondary Construction Engineering Technology School graduate or BSc Degree in Quantity Survey is a requirement. Minimum of
  • 5-10 years estimating Commercial, Institutional and/or Industrial buildings.
  • Must have knowledge of estimating and costing of structural concrete and structural steel building systems.
  • Experience should include estimating projects from 5 million to 50 million.
  • Ability to perform conceptual estimating based on written or verbal instructions.
  • Must have experience with onscreen take-off software.
  • Advanced knowledge of sub-contractor work scopes, estimating techniques and costing.
  • Must have knowledge of MS Project and/or Primavera P6 Scheduling software.
  • Ability to prepare estimating schedules for tendering review.
  • Experience with Earthwork take off programs (Agtek or equivalent) is an asset.
  • Must have excellent written and verbal communication skills.
[/vc_column_text][stm_vacancy_bottom][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][stm_sidebar sidebar="272"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" el_class="secondary_bg_color" css=".vc_custom_1447734480631{margin-bottom: 0px !important;}"][vc_column][vc_cta h2="Not sure which solution fits your business needs?" shape="square" add_button="right" btn_title="Contact Now" btn_style="outline" btn_shape="round" btn_color="white" btn_i_align="right" btn_i_icon_fontawesome="stm-arrow-next" btn_add_icon="true" el_class="secondary_bg_color"][/vc_cta][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Face the challenges of chain complexity
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row][vc_column offset="vc_col-lg-9 vc_col-md-9"][vc_custom_heading source="post_title" use_theme_fonts="yes"][stm_post_details][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447245853444{margin-bottom: 30px !important;}"]How to move a machine that is 33m long, 15m wide and 18m high? BestLogistics’ Project Logistics team knows the drill. The team coordinated the transport of a terminal built by Van Aalst Bulk Handling — cranes to discharge cement, a ship loader and two conveyor systems — together about 17 000 tons via the port of Rotterdam, the Netherlands to its final destination in two new cement-import terminals in New Zealand.[/vc_column_text][stm_image_gallery images="258,258,258,258"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1447245830869{margin-bottom: 60px !important;}"]As a sponsor of the Aprilia Racing team competing in the World Superbike Championship, one of the top three global motorsport series alongside Formula 1 and MotoGP we have got the pleasure of offering our customers a unique paddock grandstands and Aprilia box experience during several rounds.
I’ve been happy with the services provided by BestLogistic LLC. Samantha Culligan has been wonderful! She has returned my calls quickly, and she answered all my questions!
In latest round, the Pirelli Spanish Round on 19 and 20 September, the Apria team booked great results with two riders on the podium. Congratulations! Aprilia Racing is part of Piaggio Group, a global motorcycle producer and BestLogistics’ customer. The team is one of the most successful in the world with 54 titles and it is currently the world champion.[/vc_column_text][stm_post_bottom][stm_post_about_author][stm_post_comments][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/4" offset="vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs"][stm_sidebar sidebar="272"][/vc_column][/vc_row]
item.excerpt:encoded: Established in 2005, the group has grown to over 30 people and has completed 900 projects

item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1449138177261{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1449138185420{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4"][vc_column_text]

Discover our capabilities and network

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1449138191163{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8"][vc_column_text]Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather. Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route. Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity. Integrated Road networks, covering the world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1449138267101{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1449138272770{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][stm_service_info title="Logistics Ground in Asia Pacific" image="258"]
  •  Operating in all major countries and borders
  • Extensive services including: linehaul, Pick Up and Delivery (PUD), home delivery, milkrun, cross-border, courier and rail
  • Singapore to Shanghai cross-border service
  • China to Europe railway service: Innovative service balancing speed and cost; faster than Oceanfreight, cheaper than Airfreight
  • Linehaul China: 700 trucks a day, 6.25 million pallets moved yearly
[/stm_service_info][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1449138276834{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][stm_service_info title="Transportation across Europe" image="258"]
  • Multi-sector and multi-mode capabilities
  • Working with Pan-European players and niche specialists
  • Central control and network monitoring through the Control Tower
  • 450,000 tons managed a year
  • 40,000 shipments a year
  • 200 transport partners
  • Groupage/LTL/FTL
  • In Turkey, Logistics handles over 7,700 FTL trips a month
[/stm_service_info][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1449138280530{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][stm_service_info title="Logistics Ground in North America" image="258"]
  • Supports U.S. Domestic network through LTL/FTL services
  • Over 70,000 scheduled linehaul segments per year
  • Seven hubs and 62 stations
  • 7.5 million miles a month
  • 8,000 loads a month
To learn more about our ground transportation operations in North America and how we can support your business, please visit www.stylemixthemes.com.[/stm_service_info][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1449138328323{margin-bottom: 80px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 40px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2" css=".vc_custom_1449138333656{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1448609574871{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"]

Discover our capabilities and network

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather. Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route. item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1449138177261{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1449138185420{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-4 vc_col-md-4"][vc_column_text]

Discover our capabilities and network

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1449138191163{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8"][vc_column_text]Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather. Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route. Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity. Integrated Road networks, covering the world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1449138267101{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1449138272770{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][stm_service_info title="Logistics Ground in Asia Pacific" image="258"]
  •  Operating in all major countries and borders
  • Extensive services including: linehaul, Pick Up and Delivery (PUD), home delivery, milkrun, cross-border, courier and rail
  • Singapore to Shanghai cross-border service
  • China to Europe railway service: Innovative service balancing speed and cost; faster than Oceanfreight, cheaper than Airfreight
  • Linehaul China: 700 trucks a day, 6.25 million pallets moved yearly
[/stm_service_info][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1449138276834{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][stm_service_info title="Transportation across Europe" image="258"]
  • Multi-sector and multi-mode capabilities

  • Central control and network monitoring through the Control Tower
  • 450,000 tons managed a year
  • 40,000 shipments a year
  • 200 transport partners
  • Groupage/LTL/FTL
  • In Turkey, Logistics handles over 7,700 FTL trips a month
[/stm_service_info][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1449138280530{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][stm_service_info title="Logistics Ground in North America" image="258"]
  • Supports U.S. Domestic network through LTL/FTL services
  • Over 70,000 scheduled linehaul segments per year
  • Seven hubs and 62 stations
  • 7.5 million miles a month
  • 8,000 loads a month

Discover our capabilities and network

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column css=".vc_custom_1449138191163{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}" offset="vc_col-lg-8 vc_col-md-8"][vc_column_text]Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather. Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route. Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity. Integrated Road networks, covering the world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1449138267101{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3" css=".vc_custom_1449138272770{margin-bottom: 40px !important;}"][stm_service_info title="Logistics Ground in Asia Pacific" image="258"]

  • Extensive services including: linehaul, Pick Up and Delivery (PUD), home delivery, milkrun, cross-border, courier and rail
  • Singapore to Shanghai cross-border service
  • China to Europe railway service: Innovative service balancing speed and cost; faster than Oceanfreight, cheaper than Airfreight
  • Linehaul China: 700 trucks a day, 6.25 million pallets moved yearly

item.excerpt:encoded: This is due to their excellent service, competitive pricing and customer support. That's becoming so distant and digital, it's throughly refreshing to get such a personal touch.

item.excerpt:encoded: I’ve been happy with the services provided by TransCargo LLC. Samantha Culligan has been wonderful! She has returned my calls quickly, and she answered all my questions!

item.title: Packaging and Storage
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row css=".vc_custom_1448365358352{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

Discover our capabilities and network

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width="2/3"][vc_column_text]Logistics Ground’s flexible model, using only quality carriers, means you benefit from improved service levels, greater flexibility and time-definite deliveries. Our expertise in transport management and planning allows us to design a solution that meets your needs and also quickly respond to any event disruptions, such as weather. Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route. Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less complexity. Integrated Road networks, covering the world.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row css=".vc_custom_1448366045549{margin-bottom: 80px !important;}"][vc_column width="1/3"][stm_service_info title="Logistics Ground in Asia Pacific" image="258"]
  •  Operating in all major countries and borders
  • Extensive services including: linehaul, Pick Up and Delivery (PUD), home delivery, milkrun, cross-border, courier and rail
  • Singapore to Shanghai cross-border service
  • China to Europe railway service: Innovative service balancing speed and cost; faster than Oceanfreight, cheaper than Airfreight
  • Linehaul China: 700 trucks a day, 6.25 million pallets moved yearly
[/stm_service_info][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][stm_service_info title="Transportation across Europe" image="258"]
  • Multi-sector and multi-mode capabilities
  • Working with Pan-European players and niche specialists
  • Central control and network monitoring through the Control Tower
  • 450,000 tons managed a year
  • 40,000 shipments a year
  • 200 transport partners
  • Groupage/LTL/FTL
  • In Turkey, Logistics handles over 7,700 FTL trips a month
[/stm_service_info][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/3"][stm_service_info title="Logistics Ground in North America" image="258"]
  • Supports U.S. Domestic network through LTL/FTL services
  • Over 70,000 scheduled linehaul segments per year
  • Seven hubs and 62 stations
  • 7.5 million miles a month
  • 8,000 loads a month
To learn more about our ground transportation operations in North America and how we can support your business, please visit www.groundlogistics.com.[/stm_service_info][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width="stretch_row" css=".vc_custom_1448366887905{margin-bottom: 80px !important;padding-top: 80px !important;padding-bottom: 80px !important;background-color: #f7f7f7 !important;}"][vc_column width="1/2"][vc_column_text css=".vc_custom_1448366710664{margin-bottom: 35px !important;}"]

Combining transport execution and transport management services to meet all your Road Freight needs

Through our global network of control towers and state-of-the-art technology, we are able to monitor and dynamically react to situations such as adverse weather, additional pick ups or drop offs, or heavy traffic, meaning that your goods are always travelling the most efficient route. Our non-asset based Road network provides you with flexibility, improved service levels, accelerated delivery, reduced direct and indirect costs and much less[/vc_column_text][vc_btn title="Contact Now" style="outline" shape="round" color="theme_style_1" size="sm" i_align="right" i_icon_fontawesome="stm-arrow-next" add_icon="true"][/vc_column][vc_column width="1/2"][stm_image_gallery gallery_width="" img_size="540x365" vertical_navigation="yes" images="281,280,279,278,277,258"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

item.dc:creator: admin
item.excerpt:encoded: We were previously using an unreliable company with a very complicated registration and transfer process. Then we found TransCargo and the control came back to us.
